div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1807 Susa, Susiana, 1933-4 (1024) Burial: 125 B.C. (Le Rider) Contents: 162+ AE. From excavations Antiochus III: 4 (Seleuceia ad Tigrim) Seleucus IV: 1 (Susa) Antiochus VII: 8 (Susa) Seleuceia ad Tigrim: 3 Hyknapses: 1 (Susa?) Kamniskires I: 5 (Susa) Tigraeus: 56 (Susa) Mithradates I, Parthia: 12 (Susa) Phraates II: 37 (Susa) Phraates II or Artabanus 1: 7 (Susa) Artabanus I: 28 (Susa) Disposition: Paris; Teheran Unvalla, RN 1935, pp. 158-60 â€ Le Rider, Suse, pp. 249-50, illus. Unvalla gives the hoard total as 186
